page.title: 08Eskdaleside;impressions. P1
page.content:
A resident who arrived in 1985
******* {THINKS} ********
There is a good social mix and the village of Sleights is big enough to be a{viable community.
A{good variety of leisure interests lead to the residents meeting and mixing with each other.eg;sport for the young; local hitory; natural history;country pursuits;school and family based interests;arts;music.
The{Parish Council meetings are well {attended}and there is much interest in grass root politics.Someone can always be found to work for a good cause.
